full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

It was actually on another but we actually got it all sorted and fixed. Please disregard that. I'll adjust from here as I think we are both editing at the same time.

Please don't make any more changes - thanks sorry for the confusion!

Theo

Hi Theo, 

Ok sure, please have a look and let me know if this is what you were after:
https://belance.com.au/product/custom-shirt-gift-card/

Hi Heath,

With this template, are we able to do a button that would make the dropdown form appear?

i.e Have a button "ENQUIRE" and then the field appear below like we used to do in Gravity Form with conditional logic?

Cheers,

Theo

Hi Theo, 

Ok, I think we have understood what you are after, please check: https://belance.com.au/product/custom-shirt-gift-card/ and let me know?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath!

The first option worked fine but the "Gift Voucher - Options" is just missing the pricing like a normal product.

Here's the one I assigned to that tag: https://belance.com.au/product/custom-shirt-gift-card/

Thanks!

Theo

Hi Theo, 

Confirming we have now setup the below. 

To assign the Gift Voucher layout to a product, select the tag (not category) "gift voucher"
To assign the Gift Voucher Options layout to a product, select the tag (not category) "gift voucher options"

Also, we weren't able to find a product to assign the gift voucher options to. 

Let me know if you need anything else?

Thanks Heath.

So basically, we would do 3 that are:

- Gift Card: this one is already created and working fine. Keep as is.

- Gift Voucher:

This needs to have:

1) Pricing like a normal product
2) No "Still Deciding" and options below. Just the same as the "Gift Card"

Products to include here are:
https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=9584&action=edit
https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=9582&action=edit
https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=9580&action=edit
https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=9579&action=edit

- "Gift Voucher - Options"

https://belance.com.au/product/custom-shirt-gift-card/?preview_id=9470&preview_nonce=5d91b60398&_thumbnail_id=6354&preview=true

1) Pricing like a normal product
2) Two options like the one in the example
3) "Still Deciding" but with only "FAQ" and "CONTACT US"

Thanks!

Theo

Hi Theo, 

We would need to create a new template for you that loads when you assign it to a particular category. It can then have the exact elements you require. 

Generally this is a 30min task. If you would like us to proceed, please let me know:

  • What the category name will be
  • The exact elements you would like to be included in this template
  • Any exisiting products that we can assign to this new category/template.

Thanks Heath.

Just struggling a bit with the templates.

Basically, some products we need specific items below the "STILL DECIDING" and some we don't want any.

We are doing some other gift cards, but the template for category "GIFT VOUCHER" has the "STILL DECIDING" below. Whereas the category "GIFT CARDS" doesn't have it which is good however doesn't have the price there.

What is the best way to change this? Ideally need one similar to the "GIFT CARDS" category template but just with the price.

Hi Theo, 

This layout will apply to all products that are assigned to the 'Accessories' category.
So all you need to do is assign that category and the product will load with your new layout.
Thanks Heath - how do I select it when I create a new product?

Thank you Heath.

So I can make changes here that won't affect the other product templates?

Cheers,

Theo

Hi Theo, 

I have created a template for you here:
https://belance.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=8961&action=elementor#

Any changes you make on this template will show up on the products within the 'Accessories' category. 

I believe this is what you are after?
@heath please check on this one,  I think you can explain it better than me :)  Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,

I'm trying to add some accessories online on the e-commerce section (i.e sunglasses). Where do I go to edit the different sections of the product template?

I know I need to use the "NO-SIZE" form in Gravity but how do I edit or remove the boxes below and the FAQ section? Or can I just change it in elementor and duplicate that product for each one?

Thanks!

Theo
